body_html:
@FangxiangFeng I'm pretty new in Tensorflow and I've met this kind of unstable speed problem, which I think is about reading images. I trained on ImageNet with tf_recored pattern too but the time spent on each iteration is quite different. Especially after several thousand iterations, it becomes slower and slower.

I don't know if you solved your problem and could you share? Thanks.
